localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Some rooms are just too big to engage with your Clubhouse audience. AskClubhouse is a free tool that allows your listeners to ask written questions, so you pick them and answer them live on stage.
blogPost.body: Some rooms are just too big to engage with your Clubhouse audience. AskClubhouse is a free tool that allows your listeners to ask written questions, so you pick them and answer them live on stage.
blogPost.title: AskClubhouse - Allow your Clubhouse audience to ask written questions
blogPost.author: M. Brook

localize.description: 有些房间实在太大，无法与你的Clubhouse听众互动。AskClubhouse是一个免费的工具，它允许你的听众提出书面问题，所以你选择他们并在舞台上现场回答他们。
localize.tagline: 允许您的会所观众提出书面问题

localize.description: 有些房間實在太大，無法與你的Clubhouse聽衆互動。AskClubhouse是一個免費的工具，它允許你的聽衆提出書面問題，所以你選擇他們並在舞臺上現場回答他們。
localize.tagline: 允許您的會所觀衆提出書面問題

previous.excerpt: KanbanTab is the ideal default tab to help you efficiently organize tasks and build the momentum to get things done! This tool is completely free with no ads and requires no registration.
previous.title: KanbanTab - An ideal default tab to help you efficiently organize tasks

localize.description: KanbanTab是一个理想的默认标签，帮助你有效地组织任务，并建立完成任务的动力! 这款工具完全免费，没有广告，无需注册。
localize.tagline: 一个理想的默认标签，帮助你有效地组织任务。

localize.description: KanbanTab是一個理想的默認標籤，幫助你有效地組織任務，並建立完成任務的動力! 這款工具完全免費，沒有廣告，無需註冊。
localize.tagline: 一個理想的默認標籤，幫助你有效地組織任務。

next.excerpt: Distributed is a new live social chat app to help remote teams stay in sync. It started off as a jamstack demo but after spending 2-3 hours on it every day we realised it filled a huge hole in our work life as we all went remote.
next.title: Distributed - Stay in sync with friends, family and colleagues

localize.description: Distributed是一款新的实时社交聊天应用，帮助远程团队保持同步。它一开始只是一个果酱演示，但在每天花2-3个小时在上面之后，我们意识到它填补了我们工作生活中的一个巨大漏洞，因为我们都去了远程。
localize.tagline: 与朋友、家人和同事保持同步。

localize.description: Distributed是一款新的實時社交聊天應用，幫助遠程團隊保持同步。它一開始只是一個果醬演示，但在每天花2-3個小時在上面之後，我們意識到它填補了我們工作生活中的一個巨大漏洞，因爲我們都去了遠程。
localize.tagline: 與朋友、家人和同事保持同步。
